mil7.4.5:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘pabbatassa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.5:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sammanane vimanane sakkare asakkare garukare agarukare yase ayase nindaya pasamsaya sukhe dukkhe itthanitthesu sabbattha rupasaddagandharasaphotthabbadhammesu rajaniyesu na rajjitabbam, dussaniyesu na dussitabbam, muyhaniyesu na muyhitabbam, na kampitabbam na calitabbam, pabbatena viya acalena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.5:1.4: Idam, maharaja, pabbatassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.5:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pabbato thaddho na kenaci samsattho;
mil7.4.5:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena thaddhena asamsatthena bhavitabbam, na kenaci samsaggo karaniyo.
mil7.4.5:3.3: Idam, maharaja, pabbatassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.5:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pabbate bijam na viruhati;
mil7.4.5:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sakamanase kilesa na viruhapetabba.
mil7.4.5:5.3: Idam, maharaja, pabbatassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.5:9.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena nanaccuggatena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.5:9.3: Idam, maharaja, pabbatassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.5:11.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pabbato anunnato anonato;
mil7.4.5:11.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena unnatavanati na karaniya.
mil7.4.5:11.3: Idam, maharaja, pabbatassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.5:11.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, upasikaya culasubhaddaya sakasamane parikittayamanaya—
